GSP30tantralu:2622: AbhT_6.184b/. mito@pi kila kālāṃśo vitatatvena bhāsate // 184
GSP30tantralu:2624: AbhT_6.185b/. evaṃ prāṇe yathā kālaḥ kriyāvaicitryaśaktijaḥ // 185
GSP30tantralu:2635: AbhT_6.191a/. muktau ca dehe brahmādyāḥ ṣaḍadhiṣṭhānakāriṇaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2644: AbhT_6.195b/. evaṃ samāne@pi vidhiḥ sa hi hārdīṣu nāḍiṣu // 195
GSP30tantralu:2646: AbhT_6.196b/. daśa mukhyā mahānāḍīḥ pūrayanneṣa tadgatāḥ // 196
GSP30tantralu:2654: AbhT_6.200b/. viṣuvadvāsare prātaḥ sāṃśāṃ nālīṃ sa madhyagaḥ // 200
GSP30tantralu:2666: AbhT_6.206b/. vyāptau viṣeryato vṛttiḥ sāmyaṃ ca vyāptirucyate // 206
GSP30tantralu:2667: AbhT_6.207a/. tadarhati ca yaḥ kālo viṣuvattadihoditaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2681: AbhT_6.214a/. vyāne tu viśvātmamaye vyāpake kramavarjite /

GSP30tantralu:2689: AbhT_6.218a/. sa tu bhairavasadbhāvo mātṛsadbhāva eṣa saḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2692: AbhT_6.219b/. praveśa iti ṣaḍvarṇāḥ sūryendupathagāḥ kramāt // 219
GSP30tantralu:2694: AbhT_6.220b/. e+o iti praveśe tu ai+au iti dvayaṃ viduḥ // 220

GSP30tantralu:2700: AbhT_6.223b/. binduḥ prakāśo hārṇaśca pūraṇātmatayā sthitaḥ // 223
GSP30tantralu:2701: AbhT_6.224a/. uktaḥ paro@yamudayo varṇānāṃ sūkṣma ucyate /
GSP30tantralu:2705: AbhT_6.226a/. mātrā hrasvāḥ pañca dīrghāṣṭakaṃ dvistriḥ plutaṃ tu lṝ /

GSP30tantralu:2709: AbhT_6.228a/. śrīmātaṅge tathā dharmasaṃghātātmā śivo yataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2721: AbhT_6.234a/. dīrghaṃ plutaṃ kramāddvitriguṇamardhaṃ tato@pi hal /

GSP30tantralu:2737: AbhT_6.242a/. eṣa vargodayo rātrau divā cāpyardhayāmagaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:2739: AbhT_6.243a/. adhyardhā kila saṃkrāntirvarge varge divāniśoḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2766: AbhT_7.5b/. khe rasaikākṣi nityotthe tadardhaṃ dvikapiṇḍake // 5

GSP30tantralu:2788: AbhT_7.16b/. catuṣpañcāśake cakre śatānāṃ tu catuṣṭayam // 16

GSP30tantralu:2805: AbhT_7.25a/. kālastu bhedakastasya sa tu sūkṣmaḥ kṣaṇo mataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:2825: AbhT_7.35a/. na vikalpaśca ko@pyasti yo mātrāmātraniṣṭhitaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:3577: AbhT_8.339a/. mathanī damanī manonmanī ca tridṛśaḥ pītāḥ samastāstāḥ /
GSP30tantralu:3581: AbhT_8.341a/. vidyātattvordhvamaiśaṃ tu tattvaṃ tatra kramordhvagam /
GSP30tantralu:3587: AbhT_8.344a/. mukhyamantreśvarāṇāṃ yat sārdhaṃ koṭitrayaṃ sthitam /

GSP30tantralu:3594: AbhT_8.347b/. sa punaradhaḥ pathavartiṣvadhikṛta evāṇuṣu śivena // 347
GSP30tantralu:3597: AbhT_8.349a/. anugṛhyāṇumapūrvaṃ sthāpayati patiḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ sthāne /

GSP30tantralu:3601: AbhT_8.351a/. ālokayanti devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ kāraṇaṃ paramam /

GSP30tantralu:3607: AbhT_8.354a/. iṣṭā ca tannivṛttirhyabhavastvadhare na bhūyate yasmāt /

GSP30tantralu:3617: AbhT_8.359a/. śaktyāvṛtiḥ pramāṇākhyā tataḥ śāstre nirūpitā /

GSP30tantralu:3653: AbhT_8.377a/. ūrdhve bindvāvṛtirdīptā tatra tatra padmaṃ śaśiprabham /

GSP30tantralu:3665: AbhT_8.383a/. bindūrdhve@rdhenduretasya kalā jyotsnā ca tadvatī /

GSP30tantralu:3667: AbhT_8.384a/. rundhanī rodhanī roddhrī jñānabodhā tamopahā /

GSP30tantralu:3671: AbhT_8.386a/. hetūnbrahmādikān runddhe rodhikāṃ tāṃ tyajettataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:3676: AbhT_8.388b/. catvāri bhuvanānyatra dikṣu madhye ca pañcamam // 388
GSP30tantralu:3677: AbhT_8.389a/. indhikā dīpikā caiva rodhikā mocikordhvagā /

GSP30tantralu:3691: AbhT_8.396a/. śaktiḥ suptāhisadṛśī sā viśvādhāra ucyate /

GSP30tantralu:3693: AbhT_8.397a/. madhyato vyāpinī tasyāṃ vyāpīśo vyāpinīdharaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:3699: AbhT_8.400a/. śivatattvordhvataḥ śaktiḥ parā sā samanāhvayā /

GSP30tantralu:3702: AbhT_8.401b/. tadārūḍhaḥ śivaḥ kṛtyapañcakaṃ kurute prabhuḥ // 401
GSP30tantralu:3704: AbhT_8.402b/. anāśritaṃ tu vyāpāre nimittaṃ heturucyate // 402
GSP30tantralu:3705: AbhT_8.403a/. tayādhitiṣṭhati vibhuḥ kāraṇānāṃ tu pañcakam /

GSP30tantralu:3712: AbhT_8.406b/. atha sakalabhuvanamānaṃ yanmahyaṃ nigaditaṃ nijairgurubhiḥ // 406
GSP30tantralu:3715: AbhT_8.408a/. rudrāḥ śataṃ savīraṃ bahirnivṛttistu sāṣṭaśatabhuvanā syāt /

GSP30tantralu:3723: AbhT_8.412a/. ityaṣṭakaṃ jale@nau vahnyatiguhyadvayaṃ maruti vāyoḥ /

GSP30tantralu:3729: AbhT_8.415a/. dhiyi daivīnāmaṣṭau kruttejoyogasaṃjñakaṃ trayaṃ tadumā /

GSP30tantralu:5643: AbhT_13.153a/. sa siddhibhāgbhavennityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5644: AbhT_13.153b/. avidhijño vidhānajño jāyate yajanaṃ prati // 153
GSP30tantralu:5652: AbhT_13.157b/. yadrūpaṃ tatparaṃ tattvaṃ tatra tatra suniścitam // 157
GSP30tantralu:5658: AbhT_13.160b/. yo@bhyasyetsa gururnaiva vastvarthā hi viḍambakāḥ // 160
GSP30tantralu:5659: AbhT_13.161a/. paropajīvitābuddhyā sarva itthaṃ na bhāsate /
GSP30tantralu:5660: AbhT_13.161b/. taduktyā na vinā vetti śaktipātasya māndyataḥ // 161
GSP30tantralu:5661: AbhT_13.162a/. sphuṭametacca śāstreṣu teṣu teṣu nirūpyate /
GSP30tantralu:5662: AbhT_13.162b/. kiraṇāyāṃ tathoktaṃ ca gurutaḥ śāstrataḥ svataḥ // 162
GSP30tantralu:5667: AbhT_13.165a/. iti praśne kṛte devyā śrīmāñchaṃbhurnyarūpayam /
GSP30tantralu:5668: AbhT_13.165b/. upāyo@tra vivekaikaḥ sa hi heyaṃ vihāpayan // 165
GSP30tantralu:5669: AbhT_13.166a/. dadātyasya ca suśroṇi prātibhaṃ jñānamuttamam /
GSP30tantralu:5670: AbhT_13.166b/. yadā pratibhayā yuktastadā muktaśca mocayet // 166
GSP30tantralu:5672: AbhT_13.167b/. nanu prāgdīkṣayā mokṣo@dhunā tu prātibhātkatham // 167
GSP30tantralu:5673: AbhT_13.168a/. iti devyā kṛte praśne prāvartata vibhorvacaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5674: AbhT_13.168b/. dīkṣayā mucyate jantuḥ prātibhena tathā priye // 168
GSP30tantralu:5675: AbhT_13.169a/. gurvāyattā tu sā dīkṣā badhyabandhanamokṣaṇe /
GSP30tantralu:5677: AbhT_13.170a/. kevalasya dhruvaṃ muktiḥ paratattvena sā nanu /
GSP30tantralu:5679: AbhT_13.171a/. nā badhyo bandhane śaktiḥ karaṇaṃ kartṛtāṃ spṛśat /
GSP30tantralu:5680: AbhT_13.171b/. śivaḥ karteti tatproktaṃ sarvaṃ gurvāgamādaṇoḥ // 171
GSP30tantralu:5682: AbhT_13.172b/. kathaṃ vivekaḥ kiṃ vāsya devadeva vivicyate // 172
GSP30tantralu:5689: AbhT_13.176a/. bījaṃ kāloptasaṃsiktaṃ yathā vardheta tattathā /
GSP30tantralu:5693: AbhT_13.178a/. prātibhe tu samāyāte jñānamanyattu sendriyam /
GSP30tantralu:5695: AbhT_13.179a/. tattyajedbuddhimāsthāya pradīpaṃ tu yathā divā /
GSP30tantralu:5704: AbhT_13.183b/. ihaiva siddhāḥ kāyānte mucyeranniti bhāvanāt // 183
GSP30tantralu:5706: AbhT_13.184b/. etatte prātibhe bhede lakṣaṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // 184
GSP30tantralu:5710: AbhT_13.186b/. sa eva pratibhāyuktaḥ śaktitattvaṃ nigadyate // 186
GSP30tantralu:5711: AbhT_13.187a/. tatpātāveśato muktaḥ śiva eva bhavārṇavāt /
GSP30tantralu:5713: AbhT_13.188a/. vivekajaṃ ca tadbuddhyā tatkathaṃ syānnirindriyam /
GSP30tantralu:5715: AbhT_13.189a/. akṣatvaṃ pravivekena tacchittau bhāsakaḥ śivaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5717: AbhT_13.190a/. manobuddhī na bhinne tu kasmiṃścitkāraṇāntare /
GSP30tantralu:5724: AbhT_13.193b/. nanu prātibhato muktau dīkṣayā kiṃ śivādhvare // 193
GSP30tantralu:5729: AbhT_13.196a/. ityeṣa paṭhito granthaḥ svayaṃ ye boddhumakṣamāḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5737: AbhT_13.200a/. śaivī saṃbadhyate śaktiḥ śāntā muktiphalapradā /

GSP30tantralu:5748: AbhT_13.205b/. pūrvaṃ kiṃ na tathā kasmāttadaiveti na saṃgatam // 205
GSP30tantralu:5749: AbhT_13.206a/. tathābhāsanamujjhitvā na hi kālo@sti kaścana /
GSP30tantralu:5751: AbhT_13.207a/. natu paryanuyuktyai sā śive tanmahimoditā /
GSP30tantralu:5752: AbhT_13.207b/. nanu śaivī mahāśaktiḥ saṃbaddhaivātmabhiḥ sthitā /
GSP30tantralu:5753: AbhT_13.207c/. satyaṃ sācchādanātmā tu śāntā tveṣā svarūpadṛk // 207
GSP30tantralu:5754: AbhT_13.208a/. kṣobho hi bheda evaikyaṃ praśamastanmayī tataḥ // 208
GSP30tantralu:5755: AbhT_13.209a/. tayā śāntyā tu saṃbaddhaḥ sthitaḥ śaktisvarūpabhāk /
GSP30tantralu:5761: AbhT_13.212a/. evaṃ prāgviṣayo grantha iyānanyatra tu sphuṭam /
GSP30tantralu:5763: AbhT_13.213a/. ajñānarūpatā puṃsi bodhaḥ saṃkocite hṛdi /
GSP30tantralu:5764: AbhT_13.213b/. saṃkoce vinivṛtte tu svasvabhāvaḥ prakāśate // 213
GSP30tantralu:5766: AbhT_13.214b/. cihnavargo ya ukto@tra rudre bhaktiḥ suniścalā // 214
GSP30tantralu:5770: AbhT_13.216b/. tatrāpi bhuktau muktau ca prādhānyaṃ carcayedbudhaḥ // 216
GSP30tantralu:5771: AbhT_13.217a/. sa ityanto grantha eṣa dvitīyaviṣayaḥ sphuṭaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5774: AbhT_13.218b/. śivecchāvaśayogena sadguruṃ prati so@pi ca // 218
GSP30tantralu:5775: AbhT_13.219a/. atraiva lakṣitaḥ śāstre yaduktaṃ parameṣṭhinā /

GSP30tantralu:5781: AbhT_13.222a/. te yatheṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prāpya padaṃ gacchantyanāmayam /

GSP30tantralu:5784: AbhT_13.223b/. evaṃ jigamiṣāyogādācāryaḥ prāpyate sa ca // 223
GSP30tantralu:5788: AbhT_13.225b/. tasmāddīkṣāṃ sa labhate sadya eva śivapradām // 225
GSP30tantralu:5789: AbhT_13.226a/. jñānarūpāṃ yathā vetti sarvameva yathārthataḥ /
GSP30tantralu:5796: AbhT_13.229b/. tadā ca dehasaṃstho@pi sa mukta iti bhaṇyate // 229
GSP30tantralu:5798: AbhT_13.230b/. yasminkāle tu guruṇā nirvikalpaṃ prakāśitam // 230
GSP30tantralu:5799: AbhT_13.231a/. tadaiva kila mukto@sau yantraṃ tiṣṭhati kevalam /
GSP30tantralu:5801: AbhT_13.232a/. na viśaṅketa tacca śrīgamaśāstre nirūpitam /
GSP30tantralu:5803: AbhT_13.233a/. karmaṇā tena bādhyante jñānino@pi kalevare /
GSP30tantralu:5809: AbhT_13.236a/. tatra tveṣo@sti niyama āsanne maraṇakṣaṇe /
GSP30tantralu:5810: AbhT_13.236b/. tāṃ kuryānnānyathārabdhṛ karma yasmānna śuddhyati // 236
GSP30tantralu:5818: AbhT_13.240b/. tīvramadhye tu dīkṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ na tathā dṛḍhām // 240
GSP30tantralu:5819: AbhT_13.241a/. svātmano vetti śivatāṃ dehānte tu śivo bhavet /

GSP30tantralu:5824: AbhT_13.243b/. mandamadhye tu tatraiva tattve kvāpi niyojitaḥ // 243
GSP30tantralu:5825: AbhT_13.244a/. dehānte tattvagaṃ bhogaṃ bhuktvā paścācchivaṃ vrajet /
GSP30tantralu:5834: AbhT_13.248b/. na sarvaḥ pratibhāviṣṭaḥ śaktyā nīyeta sadgurum // 248
GSP30tantralu:5835: AbhT_13.249a/. iti brūte yiyāsutvaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyathā dhruvam /

GSP30tantralu:5841: AbhT_13.252a/. yadā śaivābhimānena yuktā vai paramāṇavaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:5843: AbhT_13.253a/. prāptimātrācca te siddhasādhyā iti hi gamyate /

GSP30tantralu:5862: AbhT_13.262b/. japādikā kriyāśaktirevetthaṃ natu karma tat // 262
GSP30tantralu:5863: AbhT_13.263a/. karma tallokarūḍhaṃ hi yadbhogamavaraṃ dadat /
GSP30tantralu:5864: AbhT_13.263b/. tirodhatte bhoktṛrūpaṃ saṃjñāyā tu na no bharaḥ // 263
GSP30tantralu:5869: AbhT_13.266a/. uktaṃ seyaṃ kriyāśaktiḥ śivasya paśuvartinī /

GSP30tantralu:5877: AbhT_13.270a/. tāvantaṃ bhogamādhatte paryante śivatāṃ natu /

GSP30tantralu:5886: AbhT_13.274b/. sa paraṃ prakṛterbudhne sṛṣṭiṃ nāyāti jātucit // 274

GSP30tantralu:5893: AbhT_13.278a/. svacchandaśāstre tenoktaṃ vādināṃ tu śatatrayam /

GSP30tantralu:5906: AbhT_13.284b/. granthagauravabhītyā tu tallikhitvā na yojitam // 284
GSP30tantralu:5908: AbhT_13.285b/. yayā yānti parāṃ siddhiṃ tadbhāvagatamānasāḥ // 285
GSP30tantralu:5911: AbhT_13.287a/. ātmanā tena hi śivaḥ svayaṃ pūrṇaḥ prakāśate /

GSP30tantralu:5916: AbhT_13.289b/. yayā yānti parāṃ siddhimityasyedaṃ tu jīvitam // 289
GSP30tantralu:5918: AbhT_13.290b/. śaktipātasamaye vicāraṇaṃ prāptamīśa na karoṣi karhicit //
GSP30tantralu:5919: AbhT_13.291a/. adya māṃ prati kimāgataṃ yataḥ svaprakāśanavidhau vilambase

GSP30tantralu:5931: AbhT_13.297a/. śivatvaṃ kramaśo gacchet samayī yo nirūpyate /
GSP30tantralu:5935: AbhT_13.299a/. rūpe sthito guruḥ so@pi bhogamokṣādibhedabhāk /

GSP30tantralu:5939: AbhT_13.301a/. dakṣe mate kule kaule ṣaḍardhe hṛdaye tataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:5948: AbhT_13.305b/. sarve te paśavo jñeyā bhairave mātṛmaṇḍale // 305

GSP30tantralu:5963: AbhT_13.313a/. taṃ ca tyajetpāpavṛttiṃ bhavettu jñānatatparaḥ /

GSP30tantralu:5966: AbhT_13.314b/. sa hi bhedaikavṛttitvaṃ śivajñāne śrute@pyalam // 314
GSP30tantralu:5970: AbhT_13.316b/. svacchandaśāstre proktaṃ ca vaiṣṇavādiṣu ye ratāḥ // 316
GSP30tantralu:5976: AbhT_13.319b/. uktaṃ śrīmadgahvare ca parameśena tādṛśam // 319
GSP30tantralu:5978: AbhT_13.320b/. tanna saiddhāntiko vāme nāsau dakṣe sa no mate // 320
GSP30tantralu:5979: AbhT_13.321a/. kulakaule trike nāsau pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ paratra tu /
GSP30tantralu:5991: AbhT_13.327a/. śrautaṃ cintāmayaṃ dvyātma bhāvanāmayameva ca /

GSP30tantralu:5993: AbhT_13.328a/. tattvebhya uddhṛtiṃ kvāpi yojanaṃ sakale@kale /

GSP30tantralu:6006: AbhT_13.334b/. anyaṃ tyajetprāptamapi tathācoktaṃ śivena tat // 334
GSP30tantralu:6007: AbhT_13.335a/. āmodārthī yathā bhṛṅgaḥ puṣpātpuṣpāntaraṃ vrajet /

GSP30tantralu:6009: AbhT_13.336a/. śaktihīnaṃ guruṃ prāpya mokṣajñāne kathaṃ śrayet /

GSP30tantralu:6013: AbhT_13.338a/. yastu bhogaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca vāñchedvijñānameva ca /

GSP30tantralu:6018: AbhT_13.340b/. varaṃ jñānī yo@bhyupāyaṃ diśedapica mocayet // 340
GSP30tantralu:6019: AbhT_13.341a/. jñānī na pūrṇa evaiko yadi hyaṃśāṃśikākramāt /

GSP30tantralu:6024: AbhT_13.343b/. kṛtvā jñānārṇavaṃ svābhirvipruṅgiḥ plāvayenna kim // 343
GSP30tantralu:6025: AbhT_13.344a/. ā tapanānmoṭakāntaṃ yasya me@sti gurukramaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:6027: AbhT_13.345a/. śrīmatā kallaṭenetthaṃ guruṇā tu nyarūpyata /
GSP30tantralu:6037: AbhT_13.350a/. pratyavāyo ya āmnātaḥ sa itthamiti gṛhyatām /

GSP30tantralu:6051: AbhT_13.357a/. ata eveha śāstreṣu śaiveṣveva nirūpyate /

GSP30tantralu:6056: AbhT_13.359b/. na śāsane samāmnātaṃ liṅgoddhārādi kiṃcana // 359
GSP30tantralu:6065: AbhT_14.2a/. spṛśanprakāśate yena tataḥ svacchanda ucyate /

GSP30tantralu:6074: AbhT_14.6b/. tyaktvā tu niyamaṃ kārmaṃ duḥkhamohaparītatām // 6
GSP30tantralu:6078: AbhT_14.8b/. yathā ca buddhastāṃ mūḍhaceṣṭāṃ kurvannapi dviṣan // 8

GSP30tantralu:6081: AbhT_14.10a/. ye yauṣmāke śāsanamārge kṛtadīkṣāḥ saṃgacchanto mohavaśādvipratipattim /
GSP30tantralu:6082: AbhT_14.10b/. nūnaṃ teṣā nāsti bhavadbhānuniyogaḥ saṅkocaḥ kiṃ

GSP30tantralu:6087: AbhT_14.12a/. yasmādviddhaṃ sūtakamukhyena nu tāmraṃ tadyadbhūyaḥ svāṃ
GSP30tantralu:6089: AbhT_14.12b/. no taiḥ pītaṃ bhūtalasaṃsthairamṛtaṃ tadyeṣāṃ tṛṭkṣudduḥkhavibādhāḥ punarasmin AbhT_14.13a/. tataḥ prabuddhaceṣṭāsau mantracaryārcanādikā /
GSP30tantralu:6090: AbhT_14.13b/. dveṣeddhāntardahatyenaṃ dāhaḥ śaṅkaiva sā yataḥ // 13

GSP30tantralu:6112: AbhT_14.24b/. iti pañcasu kartṛtvaṃ śivatvaṃ saṃvidātmanaḥ // 24

GSP30tantralu:6118: AbhT_14.27b/. kulālavattu kartṛtvaṃ na mukhyaṃ tadadhiṣṭhiteḥ // 27
GSP30tantralu:6119: AbhT_14.28a/. iti jñātvā grahītavyā naiva jātvapi khaṇḍanā /

GSP30tantralu:6122: AbhT_14.29b/. śivo vā parameśāno dehādiratha nirmitaḥ // 29
GSP30tantralu:6124: AbhT_14.30b/. kṛtaḥ kānyā dehatāsya tatkiṃ syādvācyatāpadam // 30

GSP30tantralu:9602: AbhT_28.191a/. yathā yathā ca naikaṭyamupāyeṣu tathā tathā /
GSP30tantralu:9608: AbhT_28.194a/. guroḥ patnī tathā bhrātā putra ityādiko gaṇaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9619: AbhT_28.199b/. svātantryāt punarātmīyādayaṃ channa iva sthitaḥ // 199
GSP30tantralu:9622: AbhT_28.201a/. ya upāyaḥ samucito jñānasantāna eṣa saḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9624: AbhT_28.202a/. galadvijātīyatayā prāpyaṃ śīghraṃ hi labhyate /
GSP30tantralu:9626: AbhT_28.203a/. dhvaṃse lokottaraṃ jñānaṃ santānāntaratāṃ śrayet /
GSP30tantralu:9630: AbhT_28.205a/. upādānaṃ hi tadyuktaṃ dehabhede hi satyapi /
GSP30tantralu:9637: AbhT_28.208b/. itthaṃ sthite trayaṃ mukhyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sahakāri ca // 208
GSP30tantralu:9643: AbhT_28.211b/. ekajanyā bhrātaraḥ syustatsadṛgyastu ko@pi saḥ // 211
GSP30tantralu:9645: AbhT_28.212b/. mukhya eṣa tu santānaḥ pūjyo mānyaśca sarvadā // 212
GSP30tantralu:9646: AbhT_28.213a/. gurvādīnāṃ ca sambhūtau dīkṣāyāṃ prāyaṇe@pi ca /
GSP30tantralu:9650: AbhT_28.215a/. dīkṣādikaśca saṃskāraḥ svātmano yatra cāhni tat /
GSP30tantralu:9652: AbhT_28.216a/. svakaṃ mṛtidinaṃ yattu tadanyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP30tantralu:9661: AbhT_28.220b/. sa vāyvātmā dṛḍhe tasmindehayantre cidātmanā // 220
GSP30tantralu:9664: AbhT_28.222a/. kramāddehena sākaṃ ca prāṇanā syādbalīyasī /
GSP30tantralu:9669: AbhT_28.224b/. uktaṃ ca gahvarābhikhye śāstre śītāṃśumaulinā // 224
GSP30tantralu:9670: AbhT_28.225a/. yathā gṛhaṃ viniṣpādya gṛhī samadhitiṣṭhati /

GSP30tantralu:9674: AbhT_28.227a/. ityādi śrīgahvaroktaṃ tata eva paṭhedbahu /
GSP30tantralu:9675: AbhT_28.227b/. kṣaye tu karmaṇāṃ teṣāṃ dehayantre@nyathāgate // 227
GSP30tantralu:9682: AbhT_28.231a/. gṛhṇāti yonije@nyatra vā dehe karmacitrite /
GSP30tantralu:9687: AbhT_28.233b/. anugrahastu yaḥ so@yaṃ svasvarūpe vikasvare // 233
GSP30tantralu:9692: AbhT_28.236a/. prāk caiṣa vistarātprokta iti kiṃ punaruktibhiḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9694: AbhT_28.237a/. dehānte śiva eveti nāsya dehāntarasthitiḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9697: AbhT_28.238b/. mṛtāste tatpuraṃ prāpya pureśairdīkṣitāḥ kramāt // 238
GSP30tantralu:9698: AbhT_28.239a/. martye@vatīrya vā no vā śivaṃ yāntyapunarbhavāḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9702: AbhT_28.241a/. so@nugrahaṃ sphuṭaṃ yāti vinā martyāvatārataḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9704: AbhT_28.242a/. yathā gaurī tapasyantī kaśmīreṣu guhāgatā /
GSP30tantralu:9705: AbhT_28.242b/. tatraiva vā yathā dhyānoḍḍāre naraharirvibhuḥ // 242
GSP30tantralu:9707: AbhT_28.243b/. sāligrāme yathā viṣṇuḥ śivo vā svopabhoginaḥ // 243
GSP30tantralu:9708: AbhT_28.244a/. tapasyantau badaryāṃ ca naranārāyaṇau tathā /
GSP30tantralu:9710: AbhT_28.245a/. ārādhitāḥ svocitaṃ tacchīghraṃ vidadhate phalam /
GSP30tantralu:9711: AbhT_28.245b/. svakṛtyāṃśasthitānāṃ ca dhāmni ye@ntaṃ vrajanti te // 245
GSP30tantralu:9720: AbhT_28.250a/. prapadyante na te sākṣādrudratāṃ tāṃ kramātpunaḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9722: AbhT_28.251a/. ityetadāgameṣūktaṃ tata eva pure pure /
GSP30tantralu:9729: AbhT_28.254b/. ahamanyaḥ parātmānyaḥ śivo@nya iti cenmatiḥ // 254
GSP30tantralu:9730: AbhT_28.255a/. na mocayenna muktaśca sarvamātmamayaṃ yataḥ /
GSP30tantralu:9736: AbhT_28.258a/. ayogināmayaṃ panthā yogī yogena vañcayet /

GSP30tantralu:9738: AbhT_28.259a/. tīrthe samāśrayāttasya vañcanaṃ tu vijāyate /

GSP30tantralu:9753: AbhT_28.266b/. siddhāntādau purāṇeṣu tathāca śrūyate bahu // 266
GSP30tantralu:9758: AbhT_28.269a/. kṛtyaṃ taducitaṃ siddhyet soṃ@śo@vatarati sphuṭam /

GSP30tantralu:9766: AbhT_28.273a/. paśumātrasya sālokyaṃ sāmīpyaṃ dīkṣitasya tu /

GSP30tantralu:9772: AbhT_28.276a/. yastu tāvadayogyo@pi tathāste sa śivālaye /
GSP30tantralu:9774: AbhT_28.277a/. nadīnagahradaprāyaṃ yacca puṇyaṃ na tanmṛtau /
GSP30tantralu:9781: AbhT_28.280b/. ācaranti ca tatte@tra sarve nirayagāminaḥ // 280
GSP30tantralu:9787: AbhT_28.283b/. chidragā api bhūyiṣṭhajñānadagdhā na rohiṇaḥ // 283
GSP30tantralu:9788: AbhT_28.284a/. ye tu kaivalyabhāgīyāḥ svāsthye@nunmiṣitāḥ sadā /
GSP30tantralu:9792: AbhT_28.286a/. ye tu kaivalyabhāgīyāḥ pratyayāste na jātucit /
GSP30tantralu:9797: AbhT_28.288b/. tirobhāvo na vijñeyo hṛdaye rūḍhyabhāvataḥ // 288
GSP30tantralu:9800: AbhT_28.290a/. naitāvatā na mukto@sau mṛtirbhogo hi janmavat /

GSP30tantralu:9803: AbhT_28.291b/. sthitau na ghnanti muktatvaṃ maraṇe@pi tathaiva tāḥ // 291
GSP30tantralu:9806: AbhT_28.293a/. śrīsvacchande tataḥ proktaṃ gandhadhāraṇayā mṛtāḥ /

GSP30tantralu:9808: AbhT_28.294a/. eteṣāṃ maraṇābhikhyo bhogo nāsti tu ye tanum /

GSP30tantralu:9822: AbhT_28.301a/. te cāpi dvividhā jñeyā laukikā dīkṣitāstathā /

GSP30tantralu:9826: AbhT_28.303a/. ye tu vijñāninaste@tra dvedhā kampretaratvataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:9830: AbhT_28.305a/. ato dehe pramādottho vikalpo dehapātataḥ /

GSP30tantralu:9834: AbhT_28.307a/. ye tu svabhyastavijñānamayāḥ śivamayāḥ sadā /
GSP30tantralu:9835: AbhT_28.307b/. jīvanmuktā hi te naiṣāṃ mṛtau kāpi vicāraṇā // 307

GSP30tantralu:9837: AbhT_28.308b/. sukhiduḥkhivimūḍhatve, mṛtāvapi tathā na sā // 308
GSP30tantralu:9840: AbhT_28.310a/. rathyāntare mūtrapurīṣamadhye caṇḍālagehe niraye śmaśāne /
GSP30tantralu:9841: AbhT_28.310b/. sacintako vā gatacintako vā jñānī vimokṣaṃ labhate@pi cānte

GSP30tantralu:9846: AbhT_28.313a/. anantakārikā caiṣā prāhedaṃ bandhakaṃ kila /

GSP30tantralu:9860: AbhT_28.320a/. tānyenaṃ na vidurbhinnaṃ taiḥ sa mukto@bhidhīyate /

GSP30tantralu:9916: AbhT_28.348a/. bhaviṣyato hi bhavanaṃ bhāvyate na sataḥ kvacit /

GSP30tantralu:9942: AbhT_28.361a/. dehānte budhyate no cet syādanyādṛkprabodhanam /
GSP30tantralu:9950: AbhT_28.365a/. bhinnakramau nipātau ca tyajatīti ca saptamīm /

GSP30tantralu:10001: AbhT_28.390b/. deva eva gurutvena tiṣṭhāsurdaśadhā bhavet // 390

GSP30tantralu:10008: AbhT_28.394a/. itthaṃ vijñāya sadā śiṣyaḥ sampūrṇaśāstraboddhāram /
GSP30tantralu:10010: AbhT_28.395a/. so@pi svaśāsanīye paraśiṣye@pivāpi tādṛśaṃ śāstram /

GSP30tantralu:10014: AbhT_28.397a/. liptāyāṃ bhuvi pīṭhe caturasre paṅkajatrayaṃ kajage /

GSP30tantralu:10025: AbhT_28.402b/. vastu vadedvākyajño vastvantarato viviktatāṃ vidadhat //

GSP30tantralu:10034: AbhT_28.407a/. vyākhyānte kṣamayitvā visṛjya sarvaṃ kṣipedagādhajale /

GSP30tantralu:10040: AbhT_28.410a/. prāyaścittavidhiḥ prokta iti devyā pracodite /

GSP30tantralu:10049: AbhT_28.414b/. yathā teṣāṃ na śāstrārthe dolārūḍhā matirbhavet // 414
GSP30tantralu:10050: AbhT_28.415a/. yatsvayaṃ śivahastākhye vidhau saṃcoditaṃ purā /

GSP30tantralu:10056: AbhT_28.418a/. mālinī mātṛkā vāpi japyā lakṣatrayāntakam /
GSP30tantralu:10070: AbhT_28.425a/. sa guruḥ sarvadā grāhyastyaktvānyaṃ tatsthitaṃ tvapi /

GSP30tantralu:10092: AbhT_29.1a/. atha samucitādhikāriṇa uddiśya rahasya ucyate@tra vidhiḥ /

GSP30tantralu:10103: AbhT_29.6b/. yadyatsamācaredvīraḥ kulayāgaḥ sa sa smṛtaḥ // 6
